title: Turnout in Pres Elections - Russia and Nigeria

content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Nigeria between 1999 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Nigeria. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about democratization in Nigeria between 1999 and 2019. (c) Explain why voter turnout for presidential elections in Russia differs from voter turnout for presidential elections in Nigeria.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in the data for Nigeria between 1999 and 2019. Explain a possible reason for this trend in Nigeria. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about democratization in Nigeria between 1999 and 2019. (c) Explain why voter turnout for presidential elections in Russia differs from voter turnout for presidential elections in Nigeria.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
